prompt: What mammal, other than elephants, is famous for its remarkable memory?
icl_complete: Dolphins are famously known for their remarkable memory. They have the ability to remember individual sounds and other dolphins' signature whistles for many years, even after a long period of separation. This impressive memory capacity is just one of the many advanced cognitive abilities that make dolphins fascinating creatures.
